https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1AtCO9ZLk0yOolkabEj3TFfBpSB.jpg Leading up to Christmas, marketing executive, Lauren, is visited by the ghosts of four ex-boyfriends. She must learn to open her heart or risk losing her best friend, Nate. Boyfriends of Christmas Past
